title: How to make money writing online - Quora

response.answer_text: You can find below, a list of websites that pay you to write, and how much they pay: Upwork:Link: https://www.upwork.com/ Up work is basically a freelancing hub, it can offer a variety of freelancing jobs online, that range from graphic design web development and all others. What’s interesting about Up work is it also specializes in finding people who can write for them. The topics can range from Technology, Health, Fitness, Medical, Legal, Business and so much more. On average, clients pay up to $30-75 per 500 words if you’re already an Intermediate writer. For beginners, it pays around $2-$15 per 500 words.Freelancer:Link:https://www.freelancer.com Much like Up work, Freelance also offers a variety of writing opportunities for budding writers, it also offers the same rates as Up work but it’s not as restrictive as Up work.Upworthy Link: https://www.upworthy.com Upworthy is quite famous for beginner level writers. Here writers are usually asked to write stories of different kinds and stories worth sharing. This site usually pays around $0.035-$0.65 per word and can range to $200.00 per article.CEO Hangout Link: http://ceohangout.com If you’re looking for a place where you can write about career, business, and finance, then this website is the right one you are looking for. It pays up to $150-$200 dollars per article. It also talks about career options and income.E-Commerce Insiders Link: http://ecommerceinsiders.com Another website that pays good money for writers is E-commerce Insider. This website talks about a lot of topics from finance, management, investment banking, and etcetera. They focus on online advertising and retail. They pay around $70-$150 per article.Freelance Moms Link: http://www.freelancemom.com By the name itself, this website is ideal for young moms to share about their experience as moms. You can write stories about motherhood and pregnancy and the great part about this site is that you can negotiate the prices. Articles that are selected for publication will be paid between $75 to $100 via PayPal. You must have a PayPal account to be paid. Every month, if your article is at the top of our most shared, you’ll be the winner of a special bonus of $150.Income DiaryLink: http://www.incomediary.com If you’re adept in SEO writing and how it works, then income diary is the writing website for you. It offers ways to generate money through online advertising and how one can make money online. You can negotiate the amount of money that you want to be paid for your article. If your article is selected, you will be paid the amount of money that you have asked for.Guide PostsLink: https://www.guideposts.org Guideposts publishes true stories about people who have attained a goal, surmounted an obstacle or learned a helpful lesson through their faith. A typical story is a first-person narrative with a spiritual point that the reader can apply to his or her own life. The story may be your own or someone else’s. Payment for full-length stories (about 1,500 words) is made when the story is accepted for publication.ParentLink: http://www.parent.co The name of this website would speak for itself. This article is basically about parenthood and help guidelines for new parents who would want to share their stories to the world. They pay $50 or more depending on the length of the article, and every article is also eligible for a social bonus of upto $300.Anxiety FoundationLink: http://www.anxietyfoundation.com A good catch for anyone who would like to share their experience, knowledge or tips about mental health. They pay $50/article.Funds for WritersLink: http://www.fundsforwriters.com Funds for writers accept articles of 500-600 words each, about earning a living as a writer. They pay $50 for unpublished original articles and $15 for reprints.Writers WeeklyLink: http://writersweekly.com They accept 400-600 word articles on how to make more money by writing! They are also interested in other forms of home-based businesses and self-employment that may result from writing, such as self-publishing, corporate writing, ghostwriting, etc. They pay $40 or $60 depending on the type of the article.RefineryLink: http://www.makealivingwriting.com The owner of this website, Carol, pays $75-$150 and up for select, longer assigned posts on specific topics related to making money online.Word Candy Link: http://wordcandy.co Word Candy is actually different from all other sites because they offer full-time writing positions. If you are a freelance blogger, they pay around 0.04$ to 0.08$/word.ListverseLink: http://listverse.com You write your list (10 items per list minimum), you send it in, and they reply and say “Great—we’ll publish it” and send you $100 by PayPal. They encourage not just expert writers, but also newbies to write a list.Women On WritingLink: http://wow-womenonwriting.com Wow! Women on Writing is an active site that pays women to write about their daily lives, from beauty tips and makeup. Articles range anywhere from 1,000 to 3,000 words—whatever length is necessary to cover the topic. Pay is arranged between the writer and editor for the piece, but most articles pay $50 or $75.Rank PayLink: https://www.rankpay.com Rank Pay is an SEO service that helps online advertisers do their job. If you’re good at SEO then this is the easiest way you can make money. They pay $50 for every original article they publish.Essig MagazineLink: http://www.essigmagazine.com Essig Magazine is famous for sharing inspirational stories and testaments. It’s basically a motivational website. They pay around $50 and up depending on the article.Just ParentsLink: http://www.justparents.co.uk Just Parents is a UK based company that gathers articles about parenthood and pregnancy and family. They pay around $50 per article.Dollar StretcherLink: http://www.stretcher.com They’re looking for specific ways to help people save time and money. In depth articles with practical ideas that people can employ to help them stretch their dollars. Query your article idea before submitting it. They accept articles that are 500-800 words in length. Payment is at the rate of $0.10 per published word.

1. Freelancer Even if you still do not work on the Internet, you have probably heard of freelancers. They are professionals who act independently offering their services to other people or even companies autonomously. But how to make money writing as a freelancer? You can offer your texts to digital entrepreneurs who have a blog but do not have time to write on this communication channel. Another option is to write sales texts for those who sell an online product. Or you can even help an expert in some subject to write an ebook on the subject that dominates. There is always someone or some company that, sooner or later, needs a very well written text. And if you don't know how to start, there are online platforms such as Workana, Nubelo /Freelancer, Soyfreelancer and Fiverr that connect content producers with those who need this type of service. 2. Blog editor Content marketing has been increasingly exploited by entrepreneurs in various areas, both online and offline. This happens because this form of promotion allows customers to reach products naturally. That is, the company no longer needs to bomb people with advertisements that, most of the time, are considered even invasive. There are many ways to set up a content marketing strategy, and creating a blog with interesting texts for customers is one of the most common ways to start implementing this type of promotion in business. That is why, more and more, blog writers are more sought after. Be it autonomously, as we showed in the previous topic, or even as hired by a company, you can earn money writing a blog for other people. In addition, if you have specific knowledge and want to share it with third parties, you can also work by writing your own blog. And how to make money writing your own blog? You can, for example, allow the display of ads on your blog or even recommend products related to the topic you are dealing with and receive commissions for sales that have your content as a source. 3. Ebook editor Still thinking about the profession of copywriters, it is possible to earn money writing ebooks. The big problem for most people who think about writing books online is that they don't always have ideas for their content. If that is your case, what you can do is look for people who are experts in their areas of activity, but who do not have the ability to write, and can offer you to develop your theme in an ebook. Again, you can use freelancers platforms to find this type of work. Now, if you want to be the author of your own content, you can create an ebook that teaches techniques for writing better, for example. Thus, you can make your ebook available on a digital product platform and earn money with your knowledge. 4. Copywriter The copywriter is one of the professions of the future that attracts the attention of those who write well and want to make money from it. Basically, the copywriter is the person who creates texts to generate sales, as in the case of advertisements, landing pages, product promotion videos and much more. But, more than writing, this professional also needs to know how to persuade with his texts. In the end, copying is a type of text that aims to convince a person to make a purchase. 5. Social network-manager Many people believe that to be a social media manager you only need to know those communication channels. Of course, this is essential, in the end, how can you manage a network you don't know? But, in addition to knowledge about social media, the good manager must also know how to write well. Why? For the simple reason that you not only have to dedicate yourself to publishing content on those networks, but it is the one that uses words to captivate and attract the attention of people who interact through those communication channels. The intention of having a manager is to keep the social networks of a business always up to date and, as you must have noticed, most of the media use words and images to communicate with their audience. Therefore, if you know how to use words to convince and charm people, take the opportunity to offer this type of service to companies and entrepreneurs with various social networks and that you know they need help in that task. 6. Author of books So far, all the professions we show for those who want to know how to make money writing involve the use of the Internet but remember that it is possible to work with that skill even outside the online environment. Have you thought about writing a book? We talk about ebooks, which are also books, but commercialized digitally. We are talking about books that do not necessarily imply technical content, such as novels, adventures, poetry, and others. Writing a book involves several processes that range from planning to publishing and selling your material. This may seem like a distant dream to most people, but if you're already a good copywriter, why not take this opportunity? And if you still don't know how to start, don't worry. We have a post here on the blog that teaches how to write and publish a book, don't miss it! 7. Screenwriter YouTube is a communication channel widely used not only by entrepreneurs but also by producers of diverse content. It has been increasingly exploited due to the ease of communicating something to an audience through videos. With that, an opportunity arises to make money writing: the role of the screenwriter. In general, when we talk about the script, we think only of movies, like those in Hollywood. However, remember that even a short video, to be of quality, needs a script. Of course, you can be a screenwriter of great films or independent films made by yourself. But if you still do not want to start, an opportunity is to write scripts for YouTube videos , for example. It offers this type of service to people you know who have ideas of themes for videos, but who do not record for not knowing how to talk about a certain issue in front of the cameras. Thus, you make money by developing the ideas of these people in a script and, perhaps, you can even be a partner or co-producer of these people's YouTube channel. In addition, many companies that have a YouTube channel need screenwriters. Therefore, this is a way to earn money that is not necessarily autonomous, since you can apply for vacancies in that function.
